remarks: Version of ~ elimhyp where the hypothesis is deduced from the final antecedent.  See ~ ghomgrplem for an example of its use.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.)
statement:
elimdhyp.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
elimdhyp.2 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
elimdhyp.3 $e |- ( B = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( th <-> ch ) ) $.
elimdhyp.4 $e |- th $.
elimdhyp $p |- ch $.
